nodes.text: This unidentified Muun female from a lower caste was a disciple of Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Tenebrous. She was instructed by Tenebrous to seduce Caar Damask of the InterGalactic Banking Clan and carry his child. In accordance with the plan, she became Damask's codicil wife and bore him a son, Hego, whom she raised with great care. Hego was eventually handed over to Tenebrous to become his apprentice, and his mother disappeared without a trace.
